snippet: Half the troupe’s dancers will tour the United States, Scotland, Italy and Switzerland, while the remainder head for Cambodia, East Timor and Taiwan, before reuniting in China.
abstract: Half the troupe’s dancers will tour the United States, Scotland, Italy and Switzerland, while the remainder head for Cambodia, East Timor and Taiwan, before reuniting in China.

headline.main: Mark Morris Dance Group to Split Up for a Global Tour
headline.print_headline: Mark Morris Group To Split Up for Tours
